snippet: Once a staple of offshore trusts, protectors have gained popularity for use in conventional domestic trusts because of the complexity of trust law.
abstract: So-called trust protectors, third parties that are enlisted to oversee trustees of trust and wills, have been gaining popularity for use in conventional domestic trusts; trend is a reaction to the increasing complexity of trust law.
lead_paragraph: Once a staple of offshore trusts, protectors have gained popularity for use in conventional domestic trusts because of the complexity of trust law.
